name: github-file-diff
description: Browser extension to view diffs of specific files on GitHub

scripts.build: npm run vendor && mkdir -p dist/ext && cp src/main.js src/vendor.css src/vendor.js src/manifest.json src/icon.png dist/ext
scripts.start: npm run vendor && web-ext -s src run
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run zip
scripts.version: echo '/"version"/ya v | n | /"version"/pu v | -1d | x' | ex package.json src/manifest.json && git add src/manifest.json

author: Mohamed Akram
